actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1582.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #784 (398-2).
Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, to provide for expedited consideration by the Civil Aeronautics Board of applications for certificates of public convenience and necessity.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1582) Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Civil Aeronautics Board (CAB) to revise its procedures for considering applications for certificates of public convenience and necessity. Requires the CAB to prescribe rules which establish time periods within which the Board will decide its cases.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, to provide for expedited consideration by the Civil Aeronautics Board of applications for certificates of public convenience and necessity.
